item.title: Strengthening The Alliance
item.description: In the Modern Software Engineeing Branch at Georgia Tech Research Institute (GTRI) we are utilizing Pachyderm and Label Studio, both part of the AI Infrastructure Alliance, to create an MLOps pipeline able to support Active Learning. We have started working with these tools based on their applicability to our situation, but also because of the incentive they have in working together as part of the AI Infrastructure Alliance. A coalition of companies banded together with the goal of becoming the canonical stack of AI and ML.
